item.title: Rockin Roary - All I Want For Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas Easy
All I Want For Christmas Is My two front Teeth Written by Don Gardener
Using the chords: Am C D7 E7 F G7
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Somebody To Love Connor Maynard C G Am F
Billie Eilish - come out and play
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: All I want for Christmas is My Two Front Teeth Ukulele Play Along
item.description: For Educational Use. This video will be used for my ukulele players, with another class singing along. Chords used are: C, D7, G7, F, E7, and Am.

item.title: The Addams Family Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of Bb.
Chords Used: Bb, Cm, F. Finger picking/TAB included.
As heard on The Addams Family
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE & Bass): https://youtu.be/jy5lUe66E-k
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: Purple People Eater Ukulele Play Along With Key Changes
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of D, Eb, E, and F.
Chords Used: D, G, A7, Eb, Ab, Bb7, E, A, B7, F, Bb, C7
As performed by Sheb Wooley.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/l285RIIffvo
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.

item.title: Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley Written by Mark James
Using the chords: Bm B7 C D D7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Stephanie Leavell - Shy Little Monster
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
Chords Used: F, A, Bb, C
As performed by Stephanie Leavell at musicforkiddos.com. A book package is available!
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/mSpOYsBAb5Y
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Train - Calling All Angels
item.description:
Calling All Angles by Train. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chords used: G, C, F, Am, and Dm. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber Earthquaker, I simply added the chords. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Heads Shoulders Knees and Toes - Ukulele Play Along Video - Very Easy
item.description:
Ukulele Play Along - Very Easy
Heads, Shoulders, Knees and Toes - Nursery Rhyme [ Updated - lyrics corrected ]
Using the chords: C, F and G7
Suggested Strum Pattern - D D D D
Ideal for younger children in primary or elementary school. This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
